# Smugglers Beware

| place         = Anzac Hall, Mosman, Sydney
| orig_lang     = English
| series        =
| subject       =
| genre         = Children's
| web           =
}}
Smugglers Beware is a 1950 Australian stage play by Eleanor Witcombe. It was widely performed and was published in book form. Witcome later adapted it into a 1963 Australian television series.
The play debuted in Sydney in 1950. Like Witcombe's earlier Pirates at the Barn and The Bushranger it proved hugely popular.
The play was presented in London in 1954.
Premise
William gets involved with a group of smugglers.
1963 television series
The book was adapted for Australian television in 1963. It played over four episodes at thirty minutes each starting 11 January 1963.
Cast
*Paddy Conroy
*Jack Allen as Croaker
*Brendon Lunney
*Ruth Cracknell
*Noel Brophy as Huggie
*Nigel Lovell
*Marcia Hathaway
*Anne Beecher
*Toby Conroy
*John Stocker
